Enables non-continuous reporting of RWAs e.g. stocks etc on Data Streams

prs.title: Prover: beta v2
prs.truncated_body:
This PR implements prover beta-v2

tracer: v2.1-rc11 (https://github.com/Consensys/linea-tracer/releases/tag/beta-v2.1-rc11)
constraints: v2.1-rc10 (https://github.com/Consensys/linea-constraints/releases/tag/beta-v2.1-rc10)
go-corset: v1.0.3 (https://github.com/Consensys/go-corset/releases/tag/v1.0.3)

### Checklist

* [ ] I wrote new tests for my new core changes.
* [ ] I have successfu

commits.message: feat(state): connect the Hub and the StateSummary
use beta-v2.0-rc1 zkevm.bin generated by go-corset
fix ReadZkevmBin error to align with go-corset v0.9.1
feat(state-manager):adding arithmetization column names for ACP and SCP
use zkevm.bin without 2B block gas limit for testing
fix(state manager):batch numbers on prover side + updated 20-byte address calculation

feat(go-corset): go-corset as submodule (#743)

* remove corset submodule

* add go-corset submodule

* use go-corst in Makefile

* use go-corset v0.9.2
fix(state-manager): fixed Shomei issue through skippable traces + missing HUB processed address constraints + cosmetic refactoring
Merge branch 'prover/beta-v2' of github.com:Consensys/linea-monorepo into prover/beta-v2
fix(state-manager):fixed wrong begin/end markers for account segments due to skipped Shomei traces
fix(state-manager): added an intermediary keccakcodehash column in state summary for the HUB connection + its constraints

(bump prover/beta-v2 branch): constraints beta-v2.1-rc4 and go-corset v1.0.1 (#766)

- bump constraints from beta-v2.1-rc1 to rc4
- bump go-corset from v0.9.2 to v1.0.1
- this commit is to bump branch prover/beta-v2 branch to the latest verion of constraints and go-corsete without rebasing onto main
fix(state-manager): account insertion's storage segments are excluded in the lookup from HUB to state summary.
fix(state-manager): added missing constraints for the insertion edge case.
(bump beta-v2 branch): constraints beta-v2.1-rc6 and go-corset v1.0.2
fix(state-manager): address edge case for SSLOAD out of gas exception behavior that results in no traces on Shomei side, but rows on the HUB side.

prs.title: fix: hashing be for batched trees for TokenData and CompressedAccount…
prs.truncated_body:
### Issue:
- `Poseidon::hashv` deserializes values be to field elements. In the current implementation we serialize numbers to little endian pass little endian bytes as slice to `Poseidon::hashv` which in turn hashes the little endian bytes deserialized as big endian which is a different number than intended. This is not immediately dangerous but breaks the functionality of using compressed accou

commits.message: fix: hashing be for batched trees for TokenData and CompressedAccount amount
refactor: indexed element hashing to use 32 byte inputs
test: add more tests CompressedAccount hash
test: randomized legacy, hash vs z hash test
test: token data legacy random test
test: circuit account hash and token data hash equivalence

prs.title: chore: Setup of consensus-model Module
prs.truncated_body:
**Description**:

Initial setup of `consensus-model` module

- Created the module `consensus-model` and moved several classes there.
Introduced the abstract classes `SerializableDataInputStream` and `SerializableDataOutputStream`. Both define the API of the current classes with the same names. This was necessary because we do not want to move the implementation dependencies to `consensus-mode

commits.message:
Set up of consensus-model module, moved Transaction, ConsensusTransaction, and TransactionWrapper

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved Versioned, RuntimeConstructable, and SerializableDet

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Introduced SerializableDataInputStream and SerializableDataOutputStream
Moved SelfSerializable and FunctionalSerialize
Fixed spotless

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved AbstractHashable, DigestType, FutureHashable, Hash, Hashable, RunningHash, SerializableHashable, BadIOException, StandardFuture, and StackTrace

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Hack that makes failing tests pass. Dependencies have to be revisited.

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved ReachedConsensus, Event, and ConsensusEvent
Fixed some unit tests

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved AbstractSerializableHashable, RunningHashable, StreamAligned, and Timestamped

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved ConsensusConstants, AncientMode, PlatformEvent, EventConstants, EventDescriptorWrapper, EventMetadata, UnsignedEvent, InterruptableConsumer, InterruptableRunnable, InterruptableSupplier, Uninterruptable, and TypedIterator

Fixed unit tests

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved EventWindow, Round, and ConsensusRound

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved Notification, AbstractNotification, IssNotification, StateSavingResult, and ScopedSystemTransaction

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Some renaming and cleanup of consensus-model

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved PlatformStatus, UniqueId, and StaleEventDetectorOutput

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Some more cleanup

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

Some more cleanups that were handled sub-optimal during refactoring

Signed-off-by: Michael Heinrichs <netopyr@users.noreply.github.com>

prs.title: fix: 🐛 add RateAdjustmentLimited
